metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2590 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: A race condition was found in the way the Linux kernel's memory subsystemhandled the copy-on-write (COW) breakage of private read-only shared memorymappings. This flaw allows an unprivileged, local user to gain write accessto read-only memory mappings, increasing their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
